titleStmt.title: A declaration of the Lord Generall and his Councel of Officers; shewing the grounds and reasons for the dissolution of the late Parliament.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army. Council.
Cromwell, Oliver, 1599-1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Hen. Hills and Tho. Brewster, Printers to the Army, and are to be sold at the sign of Sir John Old-castles in Pye-Corner, and at the three Bibles at the westend [sic] of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: In this edition line 7 of title page ends: reasons.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
